3.8.2.description: Fixes situation where certain files were formatted with Windows line endings, which broke the ability to find namespaces.
3.8.2.upgrade_notice: This is a non-critical bug fix that only affects a limited number of users. Update at your convenience.

3.8.0.description: Added composer.json description so plugin is now installable via composer. Added WPCLI command `wp mizzoumvc clear-cache` to manually clear Twig cache files.
3.8.0.upgrade_notice: This is a non-critical update. Update at your convenience.

3.7.2.description: Fixes Breadcrumbs not working correctly when enabled at a global level
3.7.2.upgrade_notice: This is a non-critical update. Update at your convenience.

3.7.1.description: Future compatibility update with changes to baseView. Currently experimenting with adding more content blocks into the baseView. This update allows for those upcoming change.
3.7.1.upgrade_notice: This is a non-critical update. Update at your convenience.
